publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3508 Alex Neil: The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*
